Topics include the first and second law of thermodynamics, open and closed system, thermodynamics properties of materials, generalied correlations with real fluids and multicomponent systems.  Emphasis is placed on the chemical potential and its use in phase equilibria and chemical reaction equilibria.

description.zh: 本課程主要是講述由粉末冶金技術製造的材料與產品包括：高熔點材料、超硬質材料、超耐熱材料、燒結電接點材料、燒結機械另件燒結摩擦材料、燒結磁性材料等，以期讓學過粉末冶金課程的學生，能進一步對粉末冶金技術之應用有更多的了解。
description.en: The course mainly lecture the materials and products which are made by powdermetallurgy techniques, including high melting material, super hard material, superheat resistant material, sintered electricjoint material, sintered mechanical parts, sintered friction material, sintered magnetic material, etc., it is expected students wholearn the powder metallurgy course may have further understanding to theapplication of powder metallurgy techniques.

description.zh: 本課程介紹X射線特性、繞射原理及X射線繞射在材料科學上之應用。內容包括X射線之產生，X射線之性質，X射線之繞射理論，材料之晶體結構與繞射條件。在X射線繞射方法方面則介紹Laue照相法，粉末法，繞射儀及光譜儀等。應用方面則包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等。
description.en: Introduction to the following topics: 1. Properties of X-Ray2. Geometry of Crystals3. Principles of X-Ray Diffraction4. Experimental Methods　(Diffractometer Measurements, Powder Photographs, and Laue Photographs)5. Applications of X-ray Diffraction on Materials Science (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

description.zh: 本課程將介紹各種植入體如暫時性維持生命等待器官捐贈之心肺輔助器(heart-lung assist devices)，或永久性置換如左心室輔助器(left ventricular assist devices)，或半永久性間歇使用者如人工腎臟(artificial kidney)等。在1950年之前，人工器官之發展仍在萌芽階段，如木製腳(wooden leg)、矯正用眼鏡(corrective glasses)、牙科植入材等，設計粗糙、不美觀、無想像力，輸血是唯一的活體器官移植。至1970年，人工器官迅速發展，開發出人工腎臟、心律調整器、心瓣膜、人工血管、心肺輔助器、人工血管、眼球晶狀體、等具巧思且設計複雜之人造器官。1980年後更開發出，薄膜肺臟(membrane lung)、可植入水晶體、指甲與肌腱、全人工關節、義耳、乳房重建材料等，擴大人工器官在臨床的使用範圍。心室輔助器與全人工心臟(total artificial heart)在最近十年，廣泛的在動物及臨床測試。處理潰濫與燒傷之人工皮膚(artificial skin)、各種生物感測器(sensory)、及性輔助器等，在1985年後也被積極的研發。最近處理人體訊息傳遞之中央及周圍神經系統(peripheral and central nervous system)或相關界面元件之訊息植入物(information prostheses)，也積極的被研究開發，如功能完全之眼及耳
description.en: In the class, the class will train the students with the basic concept of how to design a biomaterial to apply on the injured tissue without eliciting host response and enhance the tissue regeneration. The class is also intended to develop in the students a familiarity with the use of materials in medicine and dentistry and with some rational basis of these applications.

description.zh: 專業技術不斷開創與努力，如果再配合管理經營的能力，即能相得益彰，成就非凡。工廠管理是用來探討經營或管理工廠的方法，即以工廠管理人員的立場，研究如何應用最有效的方法，來組合應用各項生產要素，以獲得工廠經營的目標。目前工業發展情況，政府的工業措施與方案，以及我國文化背景，都必須與工廠管理的方法結合，才能成為最佳的經營者。
description.en: It would be an extraordinary achievement if an endless creative professional skill can be matched with excellent management ability. This course is used to discuss the method of management or administration, that is to make a research in using the most effective approach to combine all the necessary production elements from the viewpoint of factory management class, so that the management objective can be reached. The current industry development, the initiative and policy of industry, and the culture background of this country all have to be matched with factory management strategy, thus, would become the best management once and for all.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 將熱力學定律應用於計算凝結相之化學位能與其平衡，逸壓和活性因素，溶液熱力學，多元金屬溶液，相圖和相變化，運用電腦模擬相反應和相圖，及研擬冶金數學模式。
description.en: It applies thermaldynamics to calculate the chemical potential energy of condensedphase and its balance, escape pressure, activated factors, solution thermaldynamics, complex metallic solution, phase diagram and phase change. It also utilizes computer simulated phase reaction and phase diagram, and studies the mathematic model of metallurgy.

description.zh: 塑性加工係藉塑性變形將金屬材料變化成目的形狀之金屬加工法。本課程包含：金屬塑性變形之基礎，塑性力學之基礎及各種塑性加工法之介紹，最近之塑性加工技術的進步，並涉及與塑性加工關連之成形技術及適合各種塑性加工材料之選擇。
description.en: Plastic deformation processing is a metal processing method which based on plastic deformation to transform metal material into objective shape. This course includes the foundation of metal plastic deformation, the foundation of plastic dynamics, and the introduction of all kinds of plastic deformative processing methods. The recent technology development of plastic deformation processing is related to formation technique and suitable for alternatives to all kinds of plastic deformation materials.

description.zh: 具有半流體特性的粉體，其在產業上之應用範圍相當地廣，可說是涵蓋了所有的產業。其中在礦業、窯業、陶瓷業、水泥業、冶金業等工業與粉體工程有密切關係。所以，研習本課程主要的目的是讓學生對錯綜複雜的粉體問題，能有基本上的認識與了解。本課程安排的內容包括：粉粒體的定義、粉體之生成、粉體之構造與特性、粉體的物性、粉體的分離、混合、貯藏、輸送、計測與工業安全衛生等項目。
description.en: With the characteristics of semi-fluid, powder has a wide variety of applications,it covers all industries. Among of them, mineral, kiln, ceramics, cement, metallurgyindustry have a very close relationship with powder industry. Therefore, the majorpurpose of this course is to let student have basic perception and understanding tothe complex powder problems.The content of this course includes the definitionof powder body, the formation of powder body, the structure and characteristicsof powder body, the property of powder body, the separation, mixting, storage,transportation and measurement of powder body, and industry safety and sanitation.

description.zh: 主要介紹陶瓷之製程及所應用的範圍.
description.en: Introduction to The processes of ceramics materials and their application

description.zh: 本課程主要針對各種材料（金屬、陶瓷、高分子、複合材料）之基本原理，性質及應用，做概要性的介紹。內容包括材料之晶體結構與晶體缺陷，固體材料之原子擴散，相圖與相變化，材料製程及應用，材料之物理性質（光性質、電性質、磁性質及熱性質），材料之機械性質（強度、延展性、硬度、韌性、疲勞、潛變），材料之強化機構與方法。
description.en: The course mainly targets at the brief introduction to the fundamental principles, characteristics and application of the metallics, ceramics, polymer,composite material. Its content includes the crystal structure and defect, atomic diffusion of the solid materials, phase diagrams and phase transformation, material manufacturing process and application, the physic property(optical, electrical, magnetical and thermal property), mechanical property(strength, ductility& maleability, hardness, toughnesss, fatigue, and creep), strenthening structure and method.

description.zh: 課程內容包括電腦概論、程式語言以及套裝軟體之使用。
description.en: The major course includes the brief introduction of computer, computer language and the  application of package software.

description.zh: 材料之結晶構造及一般性質簡介，由簡單之單成份系，二成份系，到三成份系之平衡狀態圖，解釋各平衡狀態圖之相變態過程，並以顯微組織圖作輔助說明，由簡而繁，循序漸進，使同學容易領悟。
description.en: This course is to introduce Phase Diagrams and Microstructure.

description.zh: 本課程討論化學分析之相關理論，計算及操作。包括分析中之誤差，統計，重量法，体積法，水溶液，活性，平衡及平衡之計算，沉澱滴定，氧化－還原反應及電化學等基礎探討。
description.en: The course discusses the relating theory, calculation and operation of the chemical analysis, which includes analysis error, statistics, weight method, volume method, solution, activity, equilibrium and the calculation of equilibrium, settling titration, oxidization-reduction reaction, and electrical chemistry.

description.zh: 主要目標在介紹與實際問題相關之數學領域，以模擬解題及詮釋等方式，將數學方法應用在工程問題上。課程內容有常微分方程，線性代數，向量微積分，Fourier 分析及偏微分方程式等章節，訓練同學在理論，計算及實驗間建立正確的認知及意義。內容將繼續介紹複數分析及數值方法等章節，尤其對計算機的概念及演算法乃給予較多的強調，對實際問題亦有簡化討論。另外，在應用解決問題構想，練習例題及理論間，更有相輔相成的效果。至於線性規化，圖形組合，機率理論及數學機率等內容亦有概略介紹，務使同學有正確的認知。
description.en: The course*s main target is to introduce math region which is relating to practical questions with simulate solution and interpretation, it applies the math method to engineering questions. The course content includes ordinary differential equation, linear algebra, vector calculus, Fourier analysis and partial differencial equation partial differential equation, with the aim to train students in establishing an exact perception to the meaning of theory, calculation and experimentation. it also introduces complex number analysis and numeric method, especially put more emphasis at the computer concept and algorithm, a simplified discussion to the practical problem as well. Besides, it has a mutual supporting effect in solving question concepts, practising model question and theory. As to the linear programming, graphs and combinatorial optimization, probability theory and mathmetical probability, this course also has a brief introduction, its target is to let all the students

description.zh: 本課程包括土壤之工程性質、岩石之工程性質、地下水之生成及對工程之影響、工程地質調查之基本原則及各種調查方法簡介等。
description.en: Systematic Study of physical and chemical properties of geology. Application examples are introduced in the fields of mineral processing, metal extraction, chemical industry, etc..

description.zh: 本課程從礦物的化學成分、化學鍵及其晶體結構之理論詳細討論礦物的物理及化學性質。再就各項理化性質在選礦、冶煉、化工製造及其它物理加工等方面之應用分別舉例介紹。
description.en: Systematic Study of physical and chemical properties of minerals, and relationships of properties with chemical compositions, chemical bonding mechanisms and crystal structures. Application examples are  introduced in the fields of mineral processing, metal extraction, chemical industry, etc..

description.zh: 配合顯微組織學課程，使學生從實際顯微組織觀察中，依據相圖的理論觀念，分析和判斷材料的基本特徵。藉由應用顯微鏡設備，結合試片製作與處理的技術，從事試片構造的觀察，據此作為熱處理物件之分析，塑性加工或鑄件之研判，是為本課程的訓練目的。實習內容含括影片教學，熱電偶之測定與應用，熱分析法、以及試片的製作與處理等實作練習。
description.en: This course is to introduce Microstructure Practices.

description.zh: 課程內容包含：(1)緒論、(2)運輸系統規劃、(3)公路工程概述、(4)交通工程概述、(5)鐵路工程概述、(6)航空工程概述、(7)港灣工程概述。
description.en: Integrated transportation systems from the standpoint of assembly,haul,and distribution means.Analysis of transportequipment and traveled way.Power requirements,speed, stopping,capacity,economics,route location.Future technological developments and innovations.

description.zh: 土壤沖蝕1.農地水土保持,水土保持工程,土石流(1)小集水區求Q--合理化公式,滯洪池設計,個案研究,水土保持計畫研擬,專題討論.
description.en: Fluid mechanics,Hydrology,Statistics introduction.Soil erosion,Debris flow,Rational,Detention basin design.Agricultural soil conservation,Soil conservation engineering,Proposal writing,Case stud(Typhoon Herbur).Seminar.

name.zh: 工程監測與非破壞性檢測

description.zh: 本課內容將從最基本的量測觀念,理論,推導主工程實務的應用.例如:應力與應變的關係,應變計的種類(Foil type以及半導體),應變計的電路及按裝,溫度及非線性效應,LVDT量測原理,荷主儀的製作原理,非破壞性檢測的種類及原理,超音波檢測原理及實例.
description.en: This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of measurement,and engineering application.such as:stress-strain relation. types of strain gange(foil and semicondust),basic circuits.effects of temperature and nonlinearity,theory and applocation of LVDT and load cell.theory of nondestructive testing and its application.

description.zh: 上水道工程為當前國家重要之工程建設,本課程主要包括管渠系統設計及污水處理系統設計,授課內容涵蓋暴雨逕流計算,管渠水力學及管線系統設計,污水處理系統之規劃,污水處理單元之設計,固體物之處理與處置以及水回收再利用等重要基本知識.
description.en: The objective of this course is going to introduce the Sewage Engineering.

description.zh: 介紹工程成本運算的各種方法，藉由不同的數學分析技巧，推估並了解不同工程資金運用方案的差異性，以為決策評估及成本控制的依據。
使同學對土壤性質及受力後之行為有所認識，進而應用至基礎工程。課程內容：土壤成因、土壤物理及指數性質、土壤分類、滲透與滲流、土層內之應力分析、土壤壓縮、土壤剪力強度、側向土壓力、淺基之土壤承載力分析、邊坡穩定分析、土壤夯實。
description.en: Soil exploration and groundwater sampling;in-situ determination of properties using the split spoon,cone,dilatometer,pressuremeter,and vane equipment.Instrumentation for monitoring field performance and challeges associated with exploration and monitoring ingeotechnica/geoenvironmental engineering.

description.zh: 本課程以計算力學之理論為經，結構分析之方法為緯，教導修習學生將結構學之基本觀念徹底融通。其內容主要在說明變分原理，應用於結構分析之原理及方法，並介紹計算力學與古典力學應用於結構分析之差別及優點，使學生能對結構力學有更深刻的瞭解。
description.en: Fundamental theory of statically indeterminate structures; analysis of indeterminate beams, frames, and trusses by stiffness and flexibility methods; study of influence lines for beams, frames, and trusses.

name.en: State-the-art Constrution of Civil Engineering Techniques

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物之中間處理與最終處置之方法與技術為主,使學生瞭解廢棄物妥善清除處理之原理,此包括: 1.廢棄物種類與含義 2.廢棄物分類收集與清運 3.焚化處理 4.固化處理 5.掩埋處置 6.特殊處理方法 7.廢棄物處理廠之規劃
description.en: To promote the knowledge of principle for students ,the course ,Waste Treatment and Disposal, focuses on middle treatment and final disposal of waste. Contents of the course include: Definition and classification of waste. Storage and transportation, Incineration, Fixation, Landfill and Overall planning of treatment plant.

description.zh: 目的在使學生瞭解電腦基本知識及程式撰寫方法，以應用於土木工程問題之處理與解決。授課內容包括：電子計算機概論、資料型態、程式語言、輸出入陳述與格式、迴圈及副程式、檔案開啟，及其他應用套裝軟體之介紹。
description.en: Specifications of language syntax and semantics by grammars and automata and by attribute grammars,denotational semantics,and action equations;algebraic,denotational,and operational semantics,application of formal specifications to construction of software tools.

description.zh: 1.線性聯立微分方程2.向量分析3.富利葉級數及富利葉積分4.偏微分方程及邊界值問題
description.en: This course deals with the following subjects:Ⅰ.Ordinary Differential Equations   Ⅱ.Laplace TnangformsⅢ.Vector AnalysisⅣ.Matrices and DeterminantsⅤ.Fourier SeriesⅥ.Partial Differential Equatians

description.zh: 土木工程師到底是大地的彫刻師？還是地球的劊子手？透過本課程的介紹與討論，將可使未來的土木工程師及早在「利用厚生，利國利民」與「尊重自然與保護人類」之間思考其應尋的方向，擺脫「一群有知識的野蠻人」之惡名，達成「永續利用」與「天人合一」建設目標。
description.en: How can Civil Engineer construct the infrastracture without destroying environmental system ? In this course,we try to search and discuss the suitable solutions.

description.zh: 使同學進一步獲得土壤力學之重要觀念與理論，授課內容含粘土礦物、滲透與滲流、土壤內之應力分析、壓密理論與沈陷分析、剪力強度應力軌跡與土壤之側向土壓力、邊坡穩定分析。
description.en: Intermediate soil mechanics is an advanced knowledge following soil mechanics, and is designed to apply soil mechanics to underground excavation such as shield tunneling as well as pipe jacking. This lecture will try to help students to use the theory in soil mechanics applying into how to select tunneling optimum method and type of vertical shaft. In addition, how to manage the chamber pressure and spoil return. Field trips will be arranged to provide students more opportunities to apply what they learn in the class to be verified in the construction site.

description.zh: 結構設計之原則及理念,載重與阻抗因子設計法(LRFD)之觀念與理論,鋼結構之型式及材料,拉力構件,壓力構件,梁,梁柱,接合之設計.
description.en: Principles and philosophies of structural design,concepts and theories load and resistance factoe design. typs and materials for steel structures. tension member. Compresion members,beams,beam-columns,connections.

description.zh: 了解國內外紡織市場與行銷策略，紡織工業之建立、紡織工業之發展過、台灣紡織與製衣工業外銷情況、世界市場紡織品之行銷策略、如何突破外銷瓶頸、如何生產附加價值高之紡織品以適合市場之需要。
description.en: The purpose of this study is to provide an international and historical perspective on the situation in the Taiwan's textile industry and from this perspective on the suggest alternative for its future development.  We begin our study of marketing and discuss the facts that form the foundation for the rest of the study.(1) Economics of the global textile industry.(2) The current state of Taiwan's textile industry.(3) The evolution of competitive strategies.(4) Countermeasures for industry.    Product differentiation--higher value-added product, better quality, image or superior custmoer service.    Computerization--utilize computerized information network for internal management and worldwide trade communication.

description.zh: 本課程之授課目標為培養學生具備特用化學品基本知識、合成方法及應用原理。特用化學品種類包括：電子用特化品、塑膠用特化品、紡織用特化品及其他工業之特化品（如界面活性劑）。
description.en: An introductory course focuses on chemicals which are sold at high prices in relatively limited volumes. The scope of fine chemicals includes surfactants, plastic additives, catalysts, pesticides, flavors & fragrances, dyes & pigments, bulk medicines, etc. Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of fine chemicals are also discussed in this course.

description.zh: 本課程包含用於移植、非移植和體外的材料。移植的材料包含縫線、人工血管、人工心臟、人工骨頭、韌帶、藥物徐放裝置、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。非移植的材料有醫療用衣服、繃帶、注射器材、診療用材料等。體外的材料包含透析膜、人工肺、人工導管等。
description.en: Biomaterials is an introductory course designed for biomaterial compositions, manufacture, functionality and implantability. Biomaterials included in the course are sutures, vascular grafts, artificial organs, artificial tissues,etc. In addition, biocompatibility, biodegradability, carcinogenicity and toxicity of biomaterials are presented in detail.

description.zh: 本課程係探討纖維製品在非衣著終端領域之應用，例如電子電機，土木，材料，生醫，航空與車輛工程等之應用。其內容包括功能性與機能性纖維、複合紗、複合織物、編帶、非織物、纖維系複合材料與電線電纜、光纖電纜等之製造方法、原理與其終端應用領域。最後將討論微細加工技術與微細粉末在纖維與高科技工業上之應用。
description.en: The course is to interpret the application of the non-apparel textiles at the different end uses, such as application in electrical and electronic, civil, material, biomedical, aerospace, and vehicle engineering etc.  It includes fabrication methods, principles, and end application fields of the performance and functional fibers, composite yarns, composite fabrics, braid, nonwoven, textile composites, and cables and optical cables etc.　Finally, the micro processing technology and powder in textile and high-tech industries will be discussed.

description.zh: 本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括： (I) 高分子加工學之基礎(a)輸送現象(b)高分子黏彈學(c)高分子混煉。 (II)高分子加工學之應用(a)壓模法(b)沖模法(c)反應沖模法(d)絲線成形 等專題。
description.en: The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing . Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are devided into the following units : (I)Fundamental Studies:(a)Transport Phenomena (b)Viscoelastic Properties of Polymer Melt (c)Polymer Compounding and Blending. (II)Practical Studies:(a)Compression Molding (b)Injection Molding (c)Reaction Injection Molding (d)Fiber Formation (e)Membrane Formation.

description.zh: 本課程係討論各種纖維之化學組成、合成與成形之理論，同時針對纖維之性質、纖維改質與組成、合成、成形間之關係與影響因素及檢測加以講授。
description.en: A major object of this course is to provide a background in fiber compositions, synthesis, spinning and characterization. A second goal is to introduce factors that influence fiber compositions, formation and properties and their testing.

description.zh: 本門授課之目的在於由分子結構觀點介紹各種材料之種類、性質及用途，並針對分子科學相關的基本原理方法機構及應用做概括性的介紹。內容著重於功能性有機及無機分子，例如非線性光學分子，液晶分子，有機發光分子，半導體材料，分子元件及藥物分子。所包括之課程主題如下：1.分子、原子、分子團的基本概念2.分子性質與作用力間之學理3.有機材料分子之設計、製備、分析及應用4.無機材料分子之設計、製備、分析及應用5.分子元件之簡介6.藥物設計及原理7.分子科學之遠景及未來發展
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce the basic principles, methods, mechanisms and applications in molecular science.  Special focus will be on the discussion of functionalized organic and inorganic molecules, such as NLO, LC, OLED, semiconductors, molecular devices and drugs.  This course will cover the following topics: 1. The concepts of atoms, molecules, and clusters 2.Properties- forces theories. 3.Rational design, preparation, characterization and application of organic materials 4.Rational design, preparation, characterization and application of inorganic materials. 5.Introduction to molecular devices. 6.Drug discovery. 7.Prospective vision of molecular science.

description.zh: 介紹各類紡織纖維之染色理論與基本染色方法；包括染料應用上之分類與紡織物纖維的類別，一般染色之理論，染色機械之類別，纖維素纖維、蛋白質纖維、聚酯纖維、聚醯胺纖維、聚丙烯睛纖維及其混紡織物的染色原理及應用以及各種纖維染色缺點以及防止與修正缺點之方法。
description.en: Introducing the dyeing theory and dyeing method of various textile fibers; which include the classification of dyestuffs and textile fibers, the dyeing machine, the dyeing theory and dyeing methods of cellulosic fibers, protein fibers, synthetic fibers and their blends, also the cause and correction of dyeing defects.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在培養學生論文尋找及期刊選讀之能力，每位學生必須針對專一之問題尋找最近相關的資料。問題的認定，由老師協助資料之準備及口頭報告等是學生不可少的。且一學期至少須報告1次。學期成績將以學生在課堂上參與的態度及兩份書面資料決定。
description.en: This course is aimed at providing a training of review and paper studies for 4th grade students. Students are requested to search for the latest papers for a specific topic. Presentation and discussion are required for all attendants, twice persemester. The final score for a student will be determined based on students interaction in the class and two written reports.

description.zh: 研究複合材料原理及應用，複合材料之高分子科學，預浸料，模壓料，壓力釜成型與真空袋技術，繞線成型，編織成型，熱可塑複合材料，拉擠成型及複合材料力學及應用。
description.en: The aim of this course is to learn the principle of composite and its application.  Several composite processing methods are included.They are prepregs, molding compounds, autoclave and vaccum bag method.  Filament winding, braiding, thermoplastic composite, pultrusion are also included.  Finally, mechanic of composite and its application are discussed in detaile.

description.zh: 此課程之目標是講授生物化學原理，包含生物分子構形、代謝能源之製造與儲存，生物大分子之合成，基因訊息，人類生化之觀點。
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce the principle of biochemistry, including biomolecular conformation, generation and storage of metabolic energy, biosynthesis of macromolecular precursors, genetic information, some aspects of human biochemistry.

description.zh: 本門授課之目的在介紹各種有機化合物之合成方法、原理及應用，並探討有機實驗室常用之有機反應及其反應機構。
description.en: The course introduces various kinds of organic synthetic methods, principles and applications.  The most commonly used organic reactions and their mechanisms are also discussed.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是讓學生對材料電性行為的理論與應用能有清晰完整的認識，第一部份以古典理論觀點來解釋導體、半導體、超導、絕緣體及介電材料；第二部分以近代量子理論解釋金屬半導體及有機共軛分子的能帶理論即能階與能隙之概念；第三部分光電元件實例：發光二極體，光電二極體，場效應電極體等。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the electronic properties of materials. PartⅠ: using only"classical (pre-quantum)ideas"to introduce the concepts of electrical conductivity, light transmission, index of refraction, dielectric constant. Part Ⅱ: introducing quantum mechanics to elucidate the band theory of metals, semiconductors, and organic conjugated molecules. PartⅢ: few examples of optoelectronic devices, like p-n junction, light-emitting diodes (LEDs), field effect transistors etc.

description.zh: 本課程係講述機械設計的基本原則以及紡織機械的種類、類型與演變，並由紡織工業的發展趨勢預測紡織機械未來的發展方向。
description.en: This course introduces students the fundamental principles of machine design, history and variation of textile machinery. The trend of textile machinery development to cope with the development of textile industries is also mentioned.

description.zh: 本課程主要說明各種紡織材料之組成,基本性質,成形,各種加工與應用。
description.en: Introduction to textile compositions, properties, spinning, processings and applications.

description.zh: 本課程介紹各種分析材料表面性質的方法。藉著利用光子、電子、原子、或離子與材料表面的物理或化學作用，來獲得有關材料表面的組成、結構、化學鍵結、電子組態於表面形貌等訊息。所要介紹的表面分析儀器包括；X光電子光譜儀(XPS)、歐傑電子光譜儀（AES）、低能電子繞射儀(LEED)、電子穿隧掃描儀(STM)、表面振動光譜儀(surface vibrational spectroscopy)、程式控溫脫附法(TPD)及真空技術。
description.en: The course introduces various surface analysis methods, including XPS, AES, LEED, STM, surface vibrational spectroscopy, and TPD.  From the physical and chemical interaction between photons、electrons、atoms and ions with surfaces, the surface properties, including surface composition, surface structure, surface topography, electronic structure, and chemical bonding will be probed.

description.zh: 使學生對工程力學原理之理論與應用具有清晰、完整的概念。內容涵蓋：基本觀念，力系的平衡、摩擦、慣性矩和慣性積，質點的運動學與動力學，應力和應變，扭矩、彎力矩、樑的撓曲。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to provide the student with a clear and thorough presention of the theory and application of engineering mechanics.  The text contains general principles, equilibrium of force system, friction, moments of inertia, kinetics and dynamics of a particle, stress and strain, torsion, bending moment and bending of beam.

description.zh: 本課程是為不具化學及化工背景的紡織工程的同學所設計。主要是講授一些基本的有機化學原理、化學品的結構式與命名，以及重要的反應械構。同為係一學期的課程，所以偏重脂肪族與芳香族的介紹。
description.en: This lecture is designed to serve those students in textile engineering and mechanical engineering who must acquire a working knowledge of organic chemistry but do notneed all the detial of the traditional full-year course . Aone-semester course in this field can illustrate the fundamental principles of chemistry,of the structure and nomenclature of matter,and of the factors which govern molecular behavior. The theory and mechanisms of certain reactions have been introduced, especially when it was thought that these might be helpful in explaining to the curious student the "why" of organic chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程討論液晶之形成原理及其在高科技之應用，其內容包括1.液晶之來由及其分類2.液晶之電場與磁場效應3.液晶之光學性質4.液晶顯示器（STN LCD,TFT LCD）及其他應用5.液向型液晶及其在生物體與日常生活體品之應用6.高分子液晶與高強度纖維
description.en: The course is an introduction to Liquid Crystal Materials. Including 1.What are Liquid Crystal? 2.The story of Liquid Crystal；3.Electric and Magnetic Field Effects；4.Light and Nematic Liquid Crystal；5. Liquid Crystal Displays(STN-LCD, TFT-LCD) and other applications；6.Lyotropic Liquid Crystal；7.Polymer Liquid Crystals.

description.zh: 本課程之授課目標乃教導學生如何利用各種光譜分析方法以鑑定有機化合物之結構，包含紅外光譜、紫外線光譜、質譜儀、核磁共振光譜、X-射線光譜等。
description.en: The aim of the course is to introduce various spectroscopic methods to identify structure of organic compounds. It includes：UV spectroscopy, IR spectroscopy, NMR spectroscopy, Raman spectroscopy, Atomic  spectroscopy, Mass spectroscopy, X-ray methods, Potentiometric  methods, and Thermal methods.

description.zh: 本課程被設計為介紹有關棉細紗、毛系紗、加工絲及複合紗製造系統，與其有關之細節亦被包括在內，其課程包含有製造流程、紡紗設備之機構與終端用途。此外，本課程被架構在朝向新式紡紗製造方法，製程管制與品質管制之新近發展，電腦控制系統與自動測試系統。纖維與成紗結構和性質間之相互關係及檢測亦被討論。
description.en: The course is designed to introduce in staple, filament and composite yarns manufacturing systems, which include manufacturing process, spinning mechanism and end applications. Furthermore, the course is structured towards an advanced study of the newer methods of yarn manufacture, and the latest developments in processing control and quality control, computerized control systems and automatic measuring systems. Relationships between fiber and yarn structural properties are also discussed.

description.zh: 1.簡介：概觀、資訊源、通道、通訊品質、數位通訊系統2.信號與系統：傅立葉轉換、線性系統3.類比數位變換：取樣、量化、脈碼調變4.機率與隨機程序5.基頻脈波傳送：相配濾波器、信號間干擾與脈波塑型、等化6.數位通頻傳輸：ASK,PSK,QPSK,DPSK,FSK,QAM,MSK7.多工與展頻技術：分頻多工、分時多工、直序列與跳頻分碼多工8.源編碼：熵、資料緊縮、霍夫曼編碼、資料壓縮、JPEG9.通道編碼：線性區塊碼、迴旋碼
description.en: 1.introduction :overview,information sources,channels,quality measurement,a closer look of modern digital communication systems2.Signals and Systems:Fourier transform,linear systems3.A/D Conversion :sampling ,quantization ,PCM4.Probability and Random Process5.Baseband Pulse Transmission :matched filters,ISI and shaping ,qeualization6.Digital Passband Transmisson:ASK,PSK,QPSK,DPSK,FSK,QAM,MAK7.Multiplexing and Spread Sprctrum   Techniques:FDMA,TDMA,direct sequence and frequency hopping   CDMA8.Source Coding:entropy ,data compaction,Huffman coding,data   compression,JPEG9.Channel Coding :linear block codes,convolutional codes

description.zh: 1.簡介，2.個人電腦（PC-486）之界面，3. 視窗作業系統，Visual Basic 及Borland C++ 3.1 語言，4.視窗應用界面(API)，動態脫結程式庫 (DLL)，動態資料交換 (DDE) 及物件連結崁入(OLE) 基本程式設計，5.客戶應用程式及服務者應用程式的架構設計，6.多媒體，影像壓縮和運動，7.簡介人工智慧，專家系統，Fuzzy 及 Neural 網路，8.圖形監控系統：A. IODDE, B. NETDDE, C. 物件導向圖控, D. 分散式控制網路，9.論文研討。
description.en: 1.introduction to personal computer interface.2.Windows operation system : V.B.or VC++.3.Program design for Dynamic link library (DLL).4.Program design for Dynamic Data exchange (DEE).5.Device Driver writing for windows :I.O.DDEand NETDDE.6.Multi-media and Virtual Reality Internet.7.Introduction to A.I.and Fuzzy-Neural Network .8.Object-Qriented graphic control user interface.

description.zh: 本課程可視為電磁學之延續，介紹電磁波在各種媒質及結構中的傳播特性，以及這些現象在通訊科技之應用，討論主題如下：1.馬克斯威爾方程式之複習，2.電磁場與材料之互作用，3.電磁波於線性／非線性、全向性／異向性與均勻／不均勻材料中之傳播，4.導波管與共振腔，5.微波電路。
description.en: 1.Maxwell equations2.Magnetic fields and materials3.EM wave propagation in linear/nonlinear materials4.EM wave propagation in homogeneous/hetrogeneous materials5.Em wave propagation in isotropic/anisotropic materials6.Waveguides and resonators7.Microwave circuits

description.zh: 1.資料表示法：定點系統(Fixed Point System)，浮點系統(Floating Point System)，2.運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3.指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計(Hardwired Control)，微程式控制單元設計(Microprogramming)，4.記憶系統：記憶體之層次(Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統(Virtualmemory)，快速記憶(Cache Memory)。
description.en: 1.Data representation 2.Logic operations3.Command and control4.Memory organization5.Processor organization

description.zh: 1.電場強度電通密度、磁場強度、磁通密度電荷與電流之介紹;2.材料之導電特性，介電特性與導磁特性之介紹;3.向量數學分析之複習;4.馬克斯威爾方程式與羅倫磁力;5.靜電場之介紹;6.靜電問題之解決;7.靜磁場之介紹;8.靜磁問題之解決。
description.en: To make the students understand the basic concepts and applications of Electromafneties which includes :1.Electromafnetic Model.2.The Vector Analysis.3.Static Electric Fields.4.Electrostatic Problems`Solutions.5.Steady Eletric Currents.6. Steat Mafnetic Fields.7.Time Varying Fields and Maxwells`Equations.8.Plane Electromapnetic Waves.9.Theory and Applications of Transmission Lines.10.Wavef uide and Carity Resonators.11.Antenna and Radiation Theory.

description.zh: 1. 程式語言類別介紹 2.物件導向與資料抽象化3.類別與方法 4.訊息﹐實例與初始化 5.繼承 6.靜態與動態繫結 7.多型性 8.發展環境及工具 9. C++ Java Smalltalk 簡介10.應用程式實例介紹
description.en: 1.Programming Language Paradigms  2.Object-Orientation and Data Abstraction  3.Classes and Methods 4.Messages, Instances, and Initialization 5.Inheritance  6.Static and Dynamic Binding7.Polymorphism  8.Environment and Tools  9.Introduction to C++, Java, and Smalltalk 10.Case Study

description.zh: 介紹設施規劃，合理化的觀念、原理、方法步驟，舊規劃合理化的理由、重要性、方法及步驟。設施搬運系統及位置的遴選、及其考慮因素及決定方法
description.en: This course introduces the concepts, theories, and approaches of facilities planning.  Material handling and site selection are also included.

description.zh: 介紹系統分析的基本概念及方法，深入熟悉開發一個電腦化資訊系統之方法及步驟。包含：系統分析、系統設計、系統建置、系統運轉、系統評鑑等之實施方式及步驟。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concept and approaches for system analysis.  Besides, the methods and procedures for developing a computerized information system is also discussed.  It includes system analysis, system design, system development, system implementation and system evaluation.

description.zh: 介紹會計學之基本觀念， 會計循環 - 包括分錄、過帳、試算、結算及財務報表之編製。逐一說明財務報表各個項目，最後並介紹財務報表之分析。修畢本課程之後能瞭解會計學之基本原理，會計資料處理及財務報表產生之整個過程，以及簡單之財務報表分析技術，並為未來之企業及財務相關課程打下良好基礎。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of accounting.  All the necessary processes are included as well the financial report analysis.  After being taking this course, the student can understand the accounting concepts, accounting data process, generation of accounting report and techniques for analyzing the financial report.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。本課程內容為：零災害、指認呼喚、預知危險、衛生防護具及儀器之保養檢查及使用、職業災害之調查與處理、特殊器械的使用、工作環境認知－通風、採光、噪音、缺氧、輻射。
description.en: The course includes zero disaster, recognition calling, danger pre-recognition, sanitation protection facilities and their maintenance, survey and arrangement of vocational danger, use of special facilities, and recognition of working environment, e.g. brightness, radiation and noise.

description.zh: 本課程以提供二技及四技學生標準訂定有關各類問題解答方法。本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: Linear programming, Network analysis, Dynamic programming, Game theory, (Non)Integer linear programming, Markov chains(Markovian decision process), Queueing theory, Inventory models, Forecasting models, Decision analysis and system simulation.

description.zh: 本課程內容共分零售基本概念、零售規劃技巧、零售機構之管理、零售之行銷組合及零售之應用與未來趨勢等五篇。第一篇「零售基本概念」，介紹零售的本質，描述零售機構的型態及台灣零售業之發展與未來趨勢。第二篇「零售規劃技巧」，說明如何訂定零售策略及進行零售研究，闡述商圈規劃與分析，並且探討零售地點選擇的決策流程與評估技術。第三篇「零售機構之管理」，先敘述零售組織規劃，然後討論零售業人力資料管理的程序及重點，也論及零售機構財務規劃、分析及預算制度。第四篇「零售行銷組合」，以行銷組合（產品、訂價、通路及促銷）之概念，分別討論店面設計與商品展示、商品採購與管理，零售訂價技巧及步驟，零售促銷規劃與活動。第五篇「零售之應用與未來趨勢」，將零售管理之學理及概念應用於更廣泛之場合，包括直接銷售（Direct Selling）及綠色零售（Green Retailing），最後針對零售管理之未來趨勢探討科技應用在零售管理，網路行銷及虛擬商店。
description.en: There are five sections in this course. The first section；the basic concepts of retailing which the fundamental concepts, the models of organization and the future tendency are introduced. The second section；the skills of retailing planning, the strategy and research are discussed. The analysis of business circle and store location are decided by several different technologies. The third section；the way of establishing organization and managing the human resources, the financial planning, and budgeting are included. The fourth section；the combination of marketing, the concept of 4P（product, price, path and promotion）, the shop design and product demonstration, produce purchasing and managing, the decision of price and the activities of promotion are included. The fifth section；the future implementation of retailing, the direct selling and green retailing are included. The use of high-tech in retailing, Internet marketing and virtual store are discussed in this section.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to train student and to provide a background in the theory and methodology of general statistical issues. Topics include probability theory, inference, hypothesis testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.

description.zh: 介紹 C++ 語言基本資料處理的概念， 包含基本輸入與輸出、程式的流程控制、函數的應用等指令之撰寫、程式之編輯、編譯、聯絡與程式之執行，並發展一套應用程式。
description.en: This course introduces the basic data processes of C++ language.  They include input/output, program process control, application of functions, program editing and execution, and so on.

description.zh: 介紹工程及管理等相關套裝軟體之使用，以便應用此軟體工具處理相關資料，包含 Word Processor ， Word ， Lotus， Window ， SAS ， Power point 等。
description.en: Introduction to the software package frequently used, including MS Word, Excel, Power Point, etc.

description.zh: 本課程在於使同學瞭解管理思想的演進，組織與管理之重要理論，未來發展趨勢及理論與實務之配合技巧等。課程主要目的為：、啟迪管理哲學和觀念、以分組個案研討方式加強分析、解決問題及決策的能力，、以口頭報告來訓練表達和溝通能力，、訓練對企畫案及其他書面報告之寫作技巧，、塑造管理人員應具備的信念、特質、意志及工作倫理。
description.en: The course is to make the studendts realize :1.the progress of management,2.the important theories and the future,3.the applications technique,The objects of this course:1.realize the philosophy of management,2.emphasize the analysis ability of case studies,3.emphasize the problem-solving and decision-making abilities,4.the abilities of presentation and communication with oracle report,5.the abilities of project-writing,6.the abilities of a management manager supported to be,including belief,characters,wills and the working manners .

description.zh: 電腦繪圖應用：本課程適用於一般大專之電腦繪圖課程。其目的在說明電腦繪圖原理之基本觀念，及其相關之應用。本課程授課主題包括：電腦繪圖系統簡介、二度空間轉換問題、視窗、繪圖區域之處理、互動式電腦繪圖系統設計、三度空間轉換問題、隱藏現方法。
description.en: Computer Graphics Applications： This is an undergraduate course dealing with computer graphics.The objective of this course is to interpret the basic concepts of computer graphics theory and its applications.The main topics of this course are introductionof computer graphic system,two-dimemtional transformation,windowing,segments,interactive graphic systemdesign,three-dimemtional transformation,hidden line methods.

description.zh: 本課程內容為：工業心理的意義、發展、研究、功能及範圍。員工的態度、士氣、參與、溝通障礙之處理。市場研究、領導行為。管理心理旨在探討組織中人與事的問題；從對人員的動機、認知、學習、態度等得個別行動差異之研究，到團體行為與效能之探討，藉以促進組織發展，提昇管理績效。探討之內容包括：態度、工作滿足、性格、知覺、激勵、學習、領導、溝通、權力、衝突、組織文化、組織結構、團體動力學等。
description.en: In the course, the following topics will be discussed: overview of industrial psychology, including personnel psychology, engineering psychology, consumer psychology.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為品質管理。使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department.  Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the IE related journals.  The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 敘述工業管理的發展、沿革及新趨勢，內容:工業組織、人事管理、工廠規劃、成本分析與控制、研究發展、生產管理、物料管理、品質管理及工業安全。
description.en: This course will mainly introduce the past history, development and future trend of industrial engineering and management. It concludes industrial organization, personnel management, factory planning, cost analysis and control, R&D, production management, materials management, quality management and industrial safety.

description.zh: 使電腦系統具有解決問題的能力、智慧的表現及儲存的型態、理解及辨識的能力、及視覺、聽覺、觸覺及表達的能力、並有學習、認知、分析理解等能力。
description.en: This course includes the subjects of making a computer system, which has the capability of solving problems intelligently, storaging knowledge reasoning, recognition, vision, representation, learning, perception, and analyzing problems.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。使學生瞭解科學研究的特性、研究的類型、測量的程序與工具、資料的收集、資料的分析、撰寫研究計畫的方法，在從事管理問題之研究與探討時，知道如何正確選用適當方法，並取得所需資訊。
description.en: This course will introduce the selection of a research topic, construction of a bibliography, literature survey and data collection, and preparation of a research proposal.

description.zh: 行銷看待是設計工程─它的組合由集成資料、模式、分析和電腦模擬設計一個有效的行銷規劃。我們的教學焦點：l 定義及介紹行銷工程與網路行銷l 策略性行銷l 戰術性行銷l 結合傳統行銷概念和新的網路行銷包括討論、遞送和技術。
description.en: Marketing resembles design engineering ─it consists of putting together data, models, analysis, and computer simulations to design effective marketing plans. We focus on：l Define marketing engineering and internet marketing plans.l Strategic marketing.l Tactical marketing.l Includes discussion, tips and techniques for combining   traditional marketing concepts with new web market methods.

description.zh: 其主要是建立系統化的服務系統設計與服務作業管理方式，其內容：服務業本質的瞭解、服務設計、服務系統規劃、服務廠址選擇、服務場所佈置、服務程序設計、服務自動化及電腦化、服務作業管理人員管理、儀器設備管理、服務存貨管理、服務等候線管理、服務績效管理等。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the development, design and management of service systems. The contents include introduction of service industry, service design, service systems planning, site selection, layout, service process design, service automation, service process management, facility management, inventory control, queuing, performance management.

description.zh: 本課程主要的目的是探討企業如何有效評估經營環境與競爭的本質並建立獨特而持續性的優勢，以啟動企業長期成長及獲利的引擎，利於不敗之地。
description.en: The objective of this class is to study the enterprises；business environment and the contents of computation effectively. To build up the unique advantage and pump the long-term groan profitable engine of the business is the main goal in this topic.

description.zh: 隨著自動化科技與資訊技術的日益精進，產業生產活動必須結合資訊相關技術，朝向自動化及電子化目標以改善企業體質與提升企業競爭力。本課程之主要目標便是教導學生關於生產自動化及企業電子化之基礎資訊技術，透過實際資訊系統之建置，使學生具備基礎製造資訊系統設計之能力。
description.en: The manufacturing system becomes more complex due to the more competitive situation occurring in the marketplace. In order to survive, the enterprise must combine the automation technology and information technology to improve the manufacturing activities for fulfilling the need of production. Therefore, the aim of this course is to teach the concept and technology about manufacturing information systems. Students can learn the technology for data collection and application program design.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高等應用統計的相關原理方法與應用案例，包括一般資料分析、迴歸分析、時間序列分析、類別資料分析、樞紐分析、抽樣調查等。課程將配合個案進行討論。
description.en: This course is mainly to learn some advanced methods of statistics and their application in business. The topics include general data analysis, regression, time series analysis, category data analysis, pivot analysis and sampling investment. The course contains lecture and case study helping student to know the most important issues in applied statistics practice.

description.zh: 1.	營建組織介紹2.	營建工程概述   3.	預算與成本控制與管理   4.	進度控制與管理5.	施工計劃6.	工程發包與估算作業7.	物料與機具管理8.	合約與規範管理9.	安全衛生管理10.	品質管理
description.en: 1.	Introduction of the construction organization   2.	Introduction of the operation in the construction site  3.	Budget and cost control management   4.	Budget and cost control management5.	Planning of construction engineer project6.	Purchase and Estimate 7.	Material and Equipment control management8.	Contract and specification management9.	Safety and sanitation management10.	Quality control management

description.zh: 待修正；本課程主要在教導學生對都市空間的體驗與涵構的認知，並使學生具備都市設計之基本能力與相關知識，其主要授課內容如下：1.在範圍上--主要探討都市的涵構含實質元素、自然環境及人文向度。2.在理論上--主要探討都市構成的空間基礎理論如圖地、連接及場所理論。3.在方法上--從社區居民的經營、都市設計程序的討論以至多元設計程序法之應用。4.在實務上--以台北市及高雄新市鎮為例，研討相關案例並讀設計準則之意含。
1.建築法規體系概述、2.中央法規標準法、3.建築法架構解說、4.建築師法及營造業管理規則、5.省市建築管理規則、6.省市畸零地使用規則、7.面臨現有巷道申請建築原則、8.都市計劃法系簡介及鄉關法規介紹、9.建築技術規則及台北市土地使用分區管制規則、10. 研定(修)中之建築法規介紹。
description.en: 1.	Introduction to the Building Law and Regulation System2.	Building Code3.	Construction Code4.	Urban planning Code5.	Zoning Code6.	Analysis on New Directions of the Codes

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生坡地開發建設所需具備之相關知識，課程的內容主要的是承續坡地計畫的相關主題，但以從事實務工作所需之內容為主。授課主題涵蓋：1.基地調查與分析（包括自然與生態環境）2.基地開發之工程 3.基地開發之成本分析 4.環境影響評估 5.基地開發之相關法規 6.案例分析。
description.en: The course is intended to train the students to be able to establish a safe and high-quality hillside buildings. The primary contents include(1) influential factors of hillside environment, (2) planning and design stage strategic,(3) construction process, (4) maintenance works, and (5) regulation

description.zh: 本課程採用分組教學，以1：5的師生比例就教師之專長指導學生在建築實務工作之各領域進行資料搜集，現場觀摩，對特定之課題提出報告，訓練學生深入的接觸並膫解實際的工作，以培養學生發掘問題，解決問題之執業能力。課程中間之暑假學生必須至事務所或工地現場實習，成果列為成績之一部分。
description.en: There are teaching groups for this course, each teacher by his particular research field direct five students in special topics on Architecture practice for information collecting, site studying, and report writing, The purpose is training students to come into conduct with reality Architecture working. Then, footer students professional ability to find problems, and resolve there problems in working field.On summer vocation period, students who take this course should do practice teaching in Architecture in Architecture office or working site, and the student performance for practice teaching will reueal to final grade.

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述以建築規劃設計者之立場如何利用建築設備系統控制建築物理環境影響因子，以及其與建築物銜接介面之統合關係。本課程為第一階段之系列課程，其內容包括：1. 地球環境變遷對環境控制系統之衝擊2. 空調設備系統3. 特殊空調節能設備4. 電氣設備系統5. 設施管理6.設備更新
description.en: This course mainly discuss issues about architecture planning how a designer uses architecture equipment system to control architecture physical Environmental Impact, and its integrate relation with Building's connecting medium.This course is the first step of a series course, its content including:1. The Impact of Earth Environmental Change to Environmental Control System2. Air Conditional Equipment System  3. Special Air Conditional Energy Conservation System4. Electric equipment5. Facility Management6. Renewal of Equipment System

description.zh: 本課程期望在有限時間內對高層建築中較重要且特有的工種，如：剛構造施工、帷幕強工程、防火披覆工程、高層營建管理等加以介紹
description.en: This course purpose to introduce special and important construction method in Construction of High-Rise Building which involves Steel Structural Engineering, Curtain Wall Engineering, Fireproofing Engineering and Construction Management of High-Rise Building, etc.

description.zh: 本課程介紹當代重要的建築思潮、事件與作品。從代謝派到流體建築的發展，每週選定一個主題說明之。
description.en: The course attempts to give an introduction to important architectural thoughts, events and projects after 1900, except for the heyday of modernism. From metabolism to blobitecture, each week a lecture referring to one specific topic including relevant materials will be given.

description.zh: 一、基本觀念：1.生活、空間與建築。2.建築類型與設計的關係。二、各種建築類型分析：1.商業設施2.辦公大樓3.飯店、旅館4.學校建築5.圖書館。
description.en: 1.The basic conception: a. Living, Space and Architecture. b. The relation between building and design. 2.The analysis of the building types: a. Commercial facility. b. Office building. c. Hotel. d. School building. E. Library.

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操件之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題、2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式、3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合、4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。
description.en: The main purpose of this subject is to teach students to discuss space organization、form & behavior model；to make students be able to integrate the knowledge of architecture planning & to have the ability of practicing architecture planning.The major topics include：1、 scope：major on different usage single building2、 design content：discuss space organization、form & behavior model3、 physical factor：training students to recognize & handle physical environment, especially the integration of material, construction, structure and so on.Education：training students to have the abilities of integrating all kings of professional knowledge of architecture design & the abilities of architecture practicing.

description.zh: 一、	本課程目的在使同學認識與了解台灣傳統建築歷史、文化、技術之精髓所在，進而增進建築設計運用傳統建築思想與素材之能力。二、	講述內容包括台灣史前、原住民、荷西、明鄭、清代與近現代等建築之形成與型態變遷過程。三、	講述方式以幻燈片介紹為主，學期中並安排兩次實地參訪。
description.en: 1.	This course is based on the belief that： to recognized and understanding of the historical 、culture and technique in the Taiwan Traditional Architecture. 2.	The scope of the course are include the styles and changes in prehistorically period, aboriginal, Dutch colonialist, Ch'ing Dynasty and contemporary Taiwan Traditional Architecture.   3.	The methods of the course are slides shows and to visit the historical sites

This course is organized, as a three-year's program that is arranged around a pattern of six semesters. The modular teaching structure is:1. First year - An introduction to basic design problem solving : concepts of point, line, plane, and space organization : principles of unity/variety ,order ,balance , proportion ,scale , etc.; orthographic projection and axonometrics ; pattern diagramming ; and basic design consequences of human activity. Studio introduction to architectural design problem solving; concepts of architectural aesthetic principles; value drawing techniques; model building; anthropometries ; and human gathering and circulation patterns. Investigations of visual structures and their order , and exercises to develop ability to communicate about form and space. Explorations of two-dimensional and three-dimensional design through manipulation of the design elements in association with the design principles. Emphasis on materials , techniques , and color shape

name.en: Introduction to History of Western Architecture

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生對西方(歐洲及西亞)認識歷史建築之演進過程與思考涵構，並使學生具備西方文化歷史與思想的相關知識，其主要授課內容如下：1.在範圍上--自古埃及、西亞、古典建築、基督教建築、中世紀的大教堂時代以至文藝復興及17、18世紀的建築歷史。2.在思想上--自希臘的文化與哲學思想談起，以至各時代之政治、宗教與社會文明之演進，瞭解歷史涵構及其對建築的表現。3.在建築上─針對每一時期的建築表現，瞭解其構造方法、材料應用及相關細部特徵。
本課程以建築設計的相關知識與操作手法之介紹為主，輔以大量的案例說明。
description.en: The course attempts to give an introduction to methods of architectural design from aspects of both substantive knowledge and process skills. A large number of projects will be referred as examples.

description.zh: 本課程的授課內容如下：1.	計畫的基礎2.	建築計畫的意義與內容3.	建築計畫的進行方式4.	各種建築之建築計畫介紹（小住宅的建築計畫、集合住宅、餐廳、幼稚園）5.	實例分析
description.en: This course content about followings:1.	The basic of planning2.	The meaning of architecture planning3.	The process of architecture planning4.	Introduce to architecture of house、apartment house、restaurant、kindergarten5.	Case study

description.zh: 本課程主要在講解建築物外部空間的營造方法，內容包括理論及實際案例的說明。授課主題涵蓋：1.敷地計畫之相關理論、2.敷地計畫之內容及程序、3.基地調查及分析、4.規劃方法與計畫評估（包括土地使用、外部空間、交通動線、排水、整地、植栽）、5.環境影響評估、6.案例分析。
description.en: This course introduces the theories, principles, and methods of designing and construction of outdoor spaces. Through cases studies, the courses seeks to expand the students understanding to the major components of site planning.Topics focus on six premises:theories in relation to site planning;design sequences of site planning;investigations and analyses of the sites;planning and designing methods and their evaluations;1.	environmental impact assessment;2.	cases studies.

description.zh: 景園建築是一種自有人類生活以來便已存在的古老活動之一，隨人類文明的發展本項專業領域的探討對象與形式從個人主觀式的庭園到公共性的開放空間；與大地的關係也從破壞環境到尊重自然；工作的發展，變得更專業、更需不同專業團體運作的模式。環境規劃設計是由許多不同專業與技術領域的共同參與，其課題常錯綜複雜不易分割，且隨科技工藝的進步，所以自然也必項有專業分工的觀念，景園建築因工作對象、研討課題與理論，成為不可或缺的環境工作專業團隊之一，但這也是目前一般建築科系學生較弱的一環。本課程屬一學年課程，上學期課程主要包括景園建築領域的主要構成架構、簡要的發展歷程、古典造園景觀史、及配合各課程主題之個案解析等內容；下學期著重園景建築重要代表性案例的評析及其理論與實務之探討，尤其希望就建築系同學的角度加強介紹較重要的各種景園建築技術與個案的介紹；此外，上下學期各有一次專業參觀，使各理論與工法有機會現地實務性對照性研討，促進各主題之融會慣通。課程進行主要分為三個階段：首先，介紹各主題課程重要觀念及內容；第二部分，評析代表性景園個案及專題，以加強理論的融會貫通；最後就所介紹課程主題及案例雙向討論，並探討各重要景園主題
description.en: Landscape Architecture is one of oldest actions of mankind. It is exiting with human life for a long time. There are some main developments of field, First is objectives from personal space to public open space, second is the correlation between man and environment is replaced destroying the nature by respecting the nature. The technique of the job is more professional, need different group to engage in Environmental planning and design needs many different techniques to engage in and to dissolve problem with together. The stages of the course proceedings include three parts: First to introduce the development concept and history of the field, second to introduce some real case studies about the prior course. Last to analysis and discuss each other on the principal theory concerning the topics, in order to understand the current important inclination of L. A. ,  to apply on environmental planning and design, and to be referred about professional cooperation with L.A.

description.zh: 現今全球正處於電腦e世代時候，文字、影像、聲音、影片被廣泛的運用來傳送信息及資訊流通上。而如何來組織這些文字、影像、聲音、影片等資料就顯的非常必須且重要了。本課程將指導學生如何掌握現今市面上之電腦多媒體應用工具並將以應用在建築領域上。
description.en: Text, image, audio, video are common used to transmit information now. How to organize and represent these different kinds of data became an important issue. This course will help you to master some computer multimedia tools in architecture filed.

description.zh: 機構、機械設計、古典動力學、熱力學第一定律及熱平衡、潤滑與摩擦、機械加工、機電系統匹配、機械負載等及實驗(作)。
description.en: Mechanism and Mechanical design, Classical Dynamics, Thermal Analysis, lubrication and wear, Mechatronic system design and practice.

description.zh: 電機機械、電力系統設計與匹配、電動機驅動與設計、光電原理等及實驗(作)。
description.en: Basic Electrical Engineering training for students with Mechanical Engineering major. The goal of this course is to get familiar with the building blocks of electrical systems in Mechatronic applications. Major topics include Electrical machines, Motor Drives, Power Amplifiers, Power Electronics, and OP-Amp related signal processing circuits. Lectures are given to illustrate the function of the each block in electrical systems. And then the students can conduct experiment to explore relevant circuits in order to obtain thorough understanding of their characteristics.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機電整合系統架構，機電整合系統之機構、感測器、驅動器與致動器、介面技術、可程式控制器應用，機電整合個案分析。
description.en: Structure of mechatronic systems, mechanism of mechatronic systems, sensors, drivers and actuators, interface techniques , application of  PLC and case study.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。決策模式、決策的環境分析、決策目標訂定、決策標準、決策樹分析、決策者心理分析，常用之統計分析理論與實證之訓練。
description.en: Decision Model, Environmental Analysis of Decision, Decision Objectives Setting, Decision Criteria, Decision Tree Analysis, Psychological Analysis of Decision Maker, Theories and Practical Training of Statistic Analysis.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程將給予學習者充分瞭解現代体電路設計技術如何產生矽晶片與應用在各種複雜電子系統上.課程內容如下所述:1.系統設計流程2.MOS電晶体理論3.IC制程技術4.電路效能評估5.CMOS電路與邏輯設計6.副系統設計7.期末專題計劃
description.en: The course dims to give an understanding of how integrated circuit technology is used today to implement complex electronic systems as silicon chips.Content in the course are:1.System Design Flow 2.MOS Transistor Theory3.Fnbrcation Process Technology4.Performance Estimation 5.CMOS circuit and Logic Designs6.Subsystem Design 7.Final Project

description.zh: 1.無線通道介紹 2.天線與電波傳播簡介 3.電波傳播模式 4.巨/微/毫 細胞之電波傳播特性 5.窄頻通道之衰落效應6.寬頻通道之衰落效應 7.遮蔽效應 8.路徑分集 9.適應性天線

description.zh: 首先介紹我國及美日等國的防災體制、組織權責、運作機制，並比較其優缺點。接著討論防災資訊、通訊及新興科技在災害防球上的應用。介紹各類天然及人為災害的理論及特性，如地震、颱風、淹水、坡地災害、土石流、施工災害、環境污染、工業災害、全球氣候變遷等。從減災、整備、應變、復原重建四個時序來探討防災計畫緊急應變計畫標準作業程序的內容與要點。
description.en: This course first introduces the disaster prevention systems,jurisdiction and responsibility, and operation mechanism of several countries including Taiwan,Japan and the  United States of America. The application of computer information, communication and advanced technologies for disaster prevention will also be discussed. The characteristics of various natural and man-made disasters, such as earthquakes, typhoons, floods, slope failures, debris flows, contruction incidents, environmental pollution, industrial hazards, and global weather changing will be introduced. The major contents of disaster prevention plans, emergency response plans and standard operation procedures will e discussed corresponding to the disaster mitigation, preparedness, response and recovery.

name.en: Special Topics of Disaster Prevention and Civil Engineering

description.zh: 本課程之內容主要訓練學生獨立思考，培養學生對土木防災之認識，進而學習土木工程在防災上的應用，並進行專題報告、專題演講及研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is trying to train independent thinking, to cultivate understanding precaution of civil engineering for students. This course is also learning the application of precaution of civil engineering. In the class we have case study, seminar, and group meeting.

description.zh: 這是一門土研所的選修課，由內容包括：地震學及地震工程，強地動，振動時最高粒子速度之預測，自然頻率與阻尼之估計與量測，地盤反應分析，基地影響與設計地盤震動，打樁振動分析與永久位移，微振動量測與分析，爆炸設計等。課程中並學習使用軟體Matlab作為分析計算之主要工具。
description.en: This course is optional to all postgraduate students. The content of lectures:Seismology and earthquakes, Strong fround motion, prediction of peak particle vibrations, microvibrations, blast design.

description.en: This course is designed to teach the students to learn electro-mechanical energy conversion principles & electric machinery fundamentals, and then study the construction, types, principles, characteristics, control circuits transformer, induction machines, synchronous machines, direct-current machines, synchronous converter and specialized dynamos.

description.zh: 汽車設計概要，設計通則、材料，製造與設計的關係，汽車強度基準，引擎、底盤組件及車身之設計。
description.en: An Outline of Automotive Design， A Generality of Design，Relationships between Material，Production and Design，Standard of Automotive Strength，Design of the Components of Engine，Chassis and Body.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意自動控制概論，汽車自動變速簡介，液動基本原理，液體接合扭力變換器，行星齒輪與超速控制，自動閥控系統與換檔裝置，液壓油與液壓油之冷卻，電動自動變速簡介，各式變速箱舉例。
description.en: Introduction to Automatic Control, Introduction to AutomobileTransmission, Hydraulic Principle, Hydraulic Coupling, Planetary Gears, Automatic Transmission Valve System, Hydraulic Oil Cooling System, Introduction to Electrical Transmission System.

description.zh: 車廠佈置, 服務管理, 經營管理, 人事管理。
description.en: Workshop layout, service management, business management, personnel management.

description.zh: 引擎型式及運轉，引擎循環之理想模式，引擎設計及運轉之重要參數，燃料空氣混合之熱力學分析，工作流體的特性，實際引擎循環，引擎燃燒現象及分析，污染控制，引擎控制介紹引擎性能及特性分析。
description.en: Engine Types and Their Operation, Ideal Models of Engine Cycles, Engine Design and Operating Parameters, Thermodynamic of Fuel-Air Mixtures, Properties of Working Fluids, Practical Models of Engine Cycles, Combustion Features and Analysis, Pollutant Control, Engine Control, Engine Performance and Characteristics Analysis

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意先修課程：負責教授同意。自動控制數學基礎，物理系統的數學模式，控制器的種類，時域分析，穩定性分析，根軌跡法，頻率領域的分析，控制系統的設計。
description.en: Mathematical Foundation of Automatic Control, Mathematical Model of Physical System, Controller Type, Time-Domain Analysis, Stability Analysis, Root Locus Method, Frequency-Domain Analysis, Design of Control System.

description.zh: 本課程係以商用繪圖CAD軟體（如 TCAD 或 ACAD等）為教學範本，內容包括二維製圖，三維製圖，修訂功能表，命令腳本（Script）以及圖組(Block)、圖形功能表等之製作，以輔助機械製圖為主要目標。
description.en: Use commercial CAD Software (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the Tuitional examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and to modify the Menu, Script and Block etc

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意物質熱力學特性，改變能量形式之基本原理，熱力學第一及第二定律，可逆性與可用性，動力循環，冷凍循環，混合氣，化學反應。
description.en: Thermodynamic Properties of Substance, Energy Forms, The First Law of Thermodynamics, The Second Law of Thermodynamics, Irreversibility & Availability, Power Cycle, Refrigeration Systems, Mixtures, Chemical Reactions.

description.zh: 先修課程:4401011或負責教授同意力、質量與加速度，質點運動學，質點動力學，功與能，衝量與動量，剛體運動，剛體系的動力學。
description.en: Relations of Forces、Masses and Acceleration, Kinematics of Particles, Dynamics of Particles, Work and Energy, Impulses and Momentum, Kinematics of Rigid Bodies, Dynamics of Systems of Rigid Bodies.

description.en: Semiconductor Device, Rectifier circuit, Transistor Circuit, Operational Amplifier, Linear Integrated Circuit, Logic Device, Digital Circuit, Digital Integrated Circuit, Micro Processor, Amplifier, etc..

description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 本課程以汽車產業為例，說明車輛生產與行銷較一般商品所涵蓋的範疇複雜，如車輛製造管理、新車市場行銷、中古車通路、售後服務到融資與保險等的關連性，使之瞭解其間的重要性，並使其對未來車輛產業的職場認識有助益外，又可增添其在就業市場上的競爭機會。
description.en: This course takes the vehicle industry as an example to introduce the vehicle production and marketing in the part of production preparation, mass production control, new car marketing, used car marketing, after service, insurance, etc. The purpose of this course is to increase students' knowledge of vehicle industry and enhance students' competitive advantage.

description.zh: 本科目將由基本吸收式系統內，相關作動媒體及冷媒之行為等認識，進而學習更具高效率之各種形式吸收式系統裝置上之最佳設計能力。並且利用能源有效利用手法，導入冷熱系統工程上之實際應用規劃，以期發揮吸收式系統在各類狀況下的最能節省能源總體成本之特性。
description.en: The absorption heat pump, mainly based on absorption refrigerating machine in its cycle, is well-accepted with growing demand in air conditioning or process heating market.As the absorption cycle is a kind of heat process reaction, the absorption heat pump has wider application than any other heat pump systems have. This course outlines the classification, theory and characteristics of the absorption heat pump.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹冷凍工程，以及其應用系統，內容涵蓋如下：一.冷凍工程原理及系統。二.食品冷凍工業。三.工業冷凍。四.超低溫冷凍系統與應用。五.冷凍運輸。六.特殊冷凍應用。
description.en: This course introduces the refrigeration engineering and its system application. The contents cover the following topics: 1) The principles and system application of refrigeration engineering, 2) Food refrigeration, 3) Industrial refrigeration, 4) Extra-Low-Temperature refrigeration system and application, 5) Transport refrigeration, 6) Special application of refrigeration.

description.zh: 基本控制系統的動作方式、位置控制、比例控制、積分控制、微分控制、各種組合控制、氣壓控制裝置、電動及電子控制裝置、液壓控制裝置、空調設備上的各種控制包括溫度、壓力、風量、濕度等之控制。
description.en: To provide students with the concepts of control actions: two position control, proportional control, floating control, integral control, derivative control; to familiarize students with pneumatic control devices, fluid control devices, damper & valves, elementary control systems on HVAC & R systems, include: temperature control, humidity control, static pressure control, flow control and so on.

description.zh: 各種冷煤壓縮機簡介，容積式壓縮機效率分析，離心式壓縮機分析，各種送風機簡介，送風機應用，泵之應用分析。
description.en: Introduction to refrigerant compressors, efficiency analysis of volumetric compressors, analysis of centrifugal compressors, introduction to fans, applications of fans, and application of pumps.
